settings.para: Our products are available for shipment and delivery only in the continental U.S.A. via FedEx
All orders below $500 pay 24.95 for shipping.
Orders that total $500.01 (USD) or more will receive FREE SHIPPING. Some exclusions may apply

settings.ans:
Free shipping is valid only within the continental United States. 

Free shipping is valid to ONLINE ORDERS only. 

Free shipping is valid on orders totaling $500.01 or more, BEFORE taxes are calculated 

Some products are excluded from free shipping on orders $500.01 and over. Product indicates “additional shipping charges apply.

Delivery Time: 5 – 10 Business Days (Monday – Friday).

settings.ques: Other Details Regarding Domestic Shipping Rates Are As Follows
settings.ans:
We do not ship on Saturday and Sunday. 

Delivery time may waiver outside of estimate depending on the volume of orders. 

All orders are shipped via UPS or USPS depending on size and weight. USPS shipments are calculated based on the quantity ordered. Shipments under 4lb, (1.8kg) ship First Class Mail. All other are shipped priority Mail. 

Shipping total is provided in the cart at the checkout.

settings.ques: To Return the Item you Purchased, please Mail it to the following address:
settings.ans:
3325 NW 70TH AVE, MIAMI, FL 33122 

Refunds do not include any SHIPPING and HANDLING CHARGES shown on the packaging slip or invoice. 

Shipping charges for all returns must be prepaid and insured by you. You are responsible for any loss or damage to hardware during shipment. We do not guarantee that we will receive your returned item. 

Shipping and handling charges are not refundable. Any amounts refunded will not include the cost of shipping.

$500.01 and below orders: $24.95*. (Monday – Friday). 

Delivery Time: 5 – 10 Business Days (Monday – Friday).

If you received the wrong item or the product appears defective, please contact Customer Service. We will review each circumstance on a case-by-case basis to determine if a return can or will be processed.

If you make an error of address on your order, please note that we cannot change the delivery address after an order has been submitted. Please know that we work directly with our shipping team to help resolve any address issues whenever possible. We cannot be held responsible for any delays, fees, or other delivery issues if you’ve made an error in the shipping information on your order. If such an error causes an order to be rejected, lost, or destroyed, we can not issue a refund or replacement of any kind. If the error causes the order to be sent back to us, you may be responsible for return shipping fees. We will only refund the original cost of the merchandise.

If this is the first occasion you order with livingsilica.com, please confirm your shipping address and, if necessary, include a note in the "comments" section with additional instructions needed to execute the delivery successfully.

*Please
note that heavy or bulk items or multiple boxes may require an additional
shipping fee. Charges will be calculated at checkout. A Silicium
Laboratories representative will contact you to confirm thecharges.

** Expedited shipping orders must be placed by 12:00
pm est to ship same day.

***Please note that freight charge does not include
customs, duties, or taxes.

settings.nw_section_description:
• We do not ship on Saturday and Sunday.

  • Delivery time may waiver outside of estimate depending on the volume of orders.

  • All orders are shipped via UPS or different Freight Carrier depending on the size and weight. You´ll receive an email with your invoice and tracking number once we have processed the order and it is ready to ship from our warehouse.

  • Shipping total is provided in the cart at the checkout.

settings.nw_section_subheading: TO RETURN THE ITEM YOU PURCHASED,
settings.nw_section_description:

  • Refunds do not include any SHIPPING and HANDLING CHARGES shown on the packaging slip or invoice.

  • Shipping charges for all returns must be prepaid and insured by you. You are responsible for any loss or damage to hardware during shipment. We do not guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

  • Shipping and handling charges are not refundable. Any amounts refunded will not include the cost of shipping.

If you received the wrong item or the product appears defective, please contact Customer Service. We will review each circumstance on a case-by-case basis to determine if a return can or will be processed.

settings.para: If you make an error of address on your order, please note that we cannot change the delivery address after an order has been submitted. Please know that we work directly with our shipping team to help resolve any address issues whenever possible. We cannot be held responsible for any delays, fees, or other delivery issues if you’ve made an error in the shipping information on your order. If such an error causes an order to be rejected, lost, or destroyed, we cannot issue a refund or replacement of any kind. If the error causes the order to be sent back to us, you may be responsible for return shipping fees. We will only refund the original cost of the merchandise.

If this is the first occasion you order with wholesale.livingsilica.com, please confirm your shipping address and, if necessary, include a note in the “comments” section with additional instructions needed to execute the delivery successfully.

settings.nw_section_description: Orders usually ship the next business day after being received. The processing order time is ONE TO TWO business days, not including Saturday and Sunday orders, which are processed and shipped on the following Monday. Orders ship from Miami, FL. UPS Ground delivery requires two business days after pickup to deliver to East Coast addresses and Five business days to reach West Coast addresses. USPS Priority Mail requires two to three-day transit in the continental USA to the same areas mentioned, which means that usually, it takes from5-10 BUSINESS DAYSto deliver depending on the zone and the season.
